title: Governance | Université Paris-Saclay
snippet: The President and Vice-Presidents at Université Paris-Saclay · The Governing Board of Paris-Saclay University defines the policy set forth by Paris-Saclay University, elects its President and approves the strategic plan, as well as the organization and operation of Paris-Saclay University.

title: The President and Vice-Presidents at Université Paris-Saclay | Université Paris-Saclay
snippet: Claire Lartigue Vice-President for the Education and University Life Commission (CFVU) ... Serge Édouard Vice-President for Social Dialogue, Quality of Life at Work and Organisational Improvement

title: Election of the president of Université Paris-Saclay | Université Paris-Saclay
snippet: On Tuesday 11 June 2024, the Governing board of Université Paris-Saclay convened to elect the university’s new president. Camille Galap was elected by the members of the Governing board (36 voting members) president of Université Paris-Saclay ...

title: Paris-Saclay elects new president after months-long crisis
snippet: Camille Galap, former interim administrator of the university, succeeds Estelle Iacona as leader

title: Paris-Saclay University - Wikipedia
snippet: Since October 2023, the university has been a partner of the French private Grande École IPSA for double degrees in aerospace. In February 2024, Paris-Saclay, which brings together nearly 50,000 students, is facing a leadership crisis. The Board of Administrators has still not been able to elect its future chairman and has been under the supervision of a provisional administrator for several months.
